Package filter

Class FilterManager

java.lang.Object
filter.FilterManager
public class FilterManager extends Object
Manages filtering and recommendation states for students. Handles toggle functionality for "show all/filtered only" and "recommendations on/off"

    • applyRanking

      public List<InternshipScore> applyRanking(List<Internship> internships, Student student)
      Apply ranking to internships based on student's profile and preferences. If recommendations are disabled, all internships receive a score of 0.
